document.full_text: the idle pittsburgh penguins secured a playoff spot for the fifth consecutive season on saturday after the tampa bay lightning's 4-2 win over the carolina hurricanes.
document.title: idle penguins secure playoff spot
lines_and_colors: the idle pittsburgh penguins secured a playoff spot for the fifth consecutive season on saturday after the tampa bay lightning's 4-2 win over the carolina hurricanes.
